<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> + NumBytes &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>.size() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid fixup offset!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each byte of the fragment that the fixup touches, mask in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bits from the fixup value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != NumBytes; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Linker relaxation may change code size. We have to insert Nops</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for .align directive when linker relaxation enabled. So then Linker</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// could satisfy alignment by removing Nops.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The function returns the total Nops Size we need to insert.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loongarchasmbackend/#aa05af02ae909fc030207294fa161cd08"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loongarchasmbackend/#aa05af02ae909fc030207294fa161cd08">LoongArchAsmBackend::shouldInsertExtraNopBytesForCodeAlign</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Calculate Nops Size only when linker relaxation enabled.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!AF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcalignfragment/#ab891d26919538bc5b770905a54e2d495">getSubtargetInfo</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo/#a0ad14e9a81239b54fd64089b3290bfde">hasFeature</a>(LoongArch::FeatureRelax))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ignore alignment if MaxBytesToEmit is less than the minimum Nop size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MinNopLen = 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcalignfragment/#a76a55a6f8cab8f12dcab0797f37a6802">getMaxBytesToEmit</a>() &lt; MinNopLen)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> = AF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcalignfragment/#a5169ecb5ee59e190bdbf4d08f2e4fc8f">getAlignment</a>().<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align/#a80735739b49cf97a491922c8f9af2cc1">value</a>() - MinNopLen;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcalignfragment/#a5169ecb5ee59e190bdbf4d08f2e4fc8f">getAlignment</a>() &gt; MinNopLen;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to insert R&#95;LARCH&#95;ALIGN relocation type to indicate the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// position of Nops and the total bytes of the Nops have been inserted</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when linker relaxation enabled.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The function inserts fixup&#95;loongarch&#95;align fixup which eventually will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// transfer to R&#95;LARCH&#95;ALIGN relocation type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The improved R&#95;LARCH&#95;ALIGN requires symbol index. The lowest 8 bits of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// addend represent alignment and the other bits of addend represent the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// maximum number of bytes to emit. The maximum number of bytes is zero</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// means ignore the emit limit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loongarchasmbackend/#a36a4b135a95576724f4b520be6063ef1"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loongarchasmbackend/#a36a4b135a95576724f4b520be6063ef1">LoongArchAsmBackend::shouldInsertFixupForCodeAlign</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcassembler">MCAssembler</a> &amp;Asm,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcalignfragment">MCAlignFragment</a> &amp;AF) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Insert the fixup only when linker relaxation enabled.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!AF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcalignfragment/#ab891d26919538bc5b770905a54e2d495">getSubtargetInfo</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo/#a0ad14e9a81239b54fd64089b3290bfde">hasFeature</a>(LoongArch::FeatureRelax))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Calculate total Nops we need to insert. If there are none to insert</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then simply return.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InsertedNopBytes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loongarchasmbackend/#aa05af02ae909fc030207294fa161cd08">shouldInsertExtraNopBytesForCodeAlign</a>(AF, InsertedNopBytes))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsection">MCSection</a> &#42;Sec = AF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfragment/#a7b98ffc5ede97acf84a20b7476d3ffff">getParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> &amp;Ctx = Asm.getContext();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> &#42;Dummy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcconstantexpr/#af9bdc4c9c65ea1ff077fbbb6407d7b2a">MCConstantExpr::create</a>(0, Ctx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create fixup&#95;loongarch&#95;align fixup.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfixup">MCFixup</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppctlsdynamiccall-cpp/#a4a235aedca5bbfc39934045b6cbf9c70">Fixup</a> =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxBytesToEmit = AF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcalignfragment/#a76a55a6f8cab8f12dcab0797f37a6802">getMaxBytesToEmit</a>();</span></CodeLine>
